settings.title: Our Mission
settings.heading:
Create regenerative

skincare products that work

as hard as you do.

settings.title: Angie Buonassisi
settings.bio: Angie is a dedicated athlete trying to balance sport, activities with her young children and work. Like most modern women trying to find balance in a demanding world, she doesn’t have time for a complicated skincare routine. She was inspired to develop a line of products that support the extreme conditions of an athlete’s lifestyle — from pollution to the elements. As the co-owner of the 8 West Clinic, she sees the concerns and needs of thousands of patients. Beyond creating a skincare brand that meets the unique needs of an athlete’s skin, she is also passionate about creating a community that is inspired by the support and strength of female athletes. As of 2022, she is in her 6th and final year on the Board of Directors for Cycling BC.

settings.heading: Who we are
settings.message: The team behind Lontreau is passionate about sport and use their own experience to develop products that can benefit everyone.

settings.title: Inspire through storytelling
settings.message: We want to inspire the Lontreau community with stories from everyday and professional athletes that are doing (and have done) exceptional things.

settings.title: Build up our community
settings.message: Lontreau is for everyone from movement enthusiasts to professional athletes. We want to provide a positive environment and community to connect and inspire.

settings.title: Respect the earth
settings.message: Our community spends a lot of time outdoors, so we want to show our respect to the planet we love to explore. Lontreau is dedicated to reaching Plastic Negative and creating sustainable initiatives for our future.

settings.title: Prioritize effort over perfection
settings.message: We're more passionate about the journey than the goals at the finish line. We don’t use language that speaks to perfection, instead, we like to focus on health.
